basis: The user has shown strong planning and willingness to log and adapt, but BED-related urges and heat/late-night timing have historically lowered consistent follow-through. This plan is practical and likely to be started, but actual adherence may be intermittent.
coaching_notes: Support with ultra-simple logging options (one-tap or short voice memo), keep reminders lightweight and non-pressuring, and tailor prompts to hot days and travel/outing scenarios. Offer quick check-ins after tonight to adjust triggers, timing, and snack options based on patterns.
